messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] blogger/blogspot
messages.msgSnippet:
Yeah, that s it... Ren got it right!  TOS and homeschoolblogger are closely
tied to the Pearls. Lesa ... From: Ren Allen Date: 09/17/06 16:13:24 To:
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, that's it... Ren got it right! TOS and homeschoolblogger are closely
tied to the Pearls.

Lesa

-------Original Message-------

From: Ren Allen
Date: 09/17/06 16:13:24
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] blogger/blogspot

"But can use this site well... but when I random blog I never find any
other unschoolers..... Just curious."

I believe it's run by a Christian group. Also, I believe they had
something to do with supporting the Pearl's abusive methods so a lot
of homeschoolers left their blogging system over that.

Someone else might know more.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
